channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Equal Representation’ Should Mean Equal Representation for American Citizens
item.description: Restoring a citizenship question to the U.S. census would help rectify imbalances in congressional representation.

item.title: Jon Kyl, a Persuasive Advocate of Defense
item.description: The former Arizona senator, who is withdrawing from public life, was an admired legislator who understood the limits of diplomacy alone.

item.title: The Supreme Court Must Find the Courage to Defend the Truth on Women’s Sports
item.description: The Supreme Court can either protect women as a real, distinct class, or it can green-light the erasure of women’s spaces and sports. There is no midd...

item.title: Canadian ambassador to U.S. reaffirms commitment to U.N. and EU
item.description: Canadian Ambassador to the U.S. Kirsten Hillman reaffirmed her country's commitment to established international institutions on Sunday.

item.title: In the Abortion Industry, ‘Access’ Now Matters More Than Care
item.description: Mail-order abortion drugs are redefining medical standards — and not in a good way.

item.title: DC Leftists Threaten Families As ‘Nazi Scum’ Simply For Attending Church
item.description: Families with young kids were subject to a bullhorn-wielding protestor screaming 'F-ck Jesus, Mary, and Joseph' in a demonic-sounding tone.

item.title: Vance Promises Attention To Pro-Life Concerns: ‘You Have An Ally In The White House’
item.description: Vance used most of his time on the March For Life’s National Mall stage to tout the Trump administration’s pro-life track record.
